last_episode_to_air.name: Descent into Madness
last_episode_to_air.overview: Caligula's increasing paranoia and debauchery lead to ruinous bloodshed and spending as Rome, the Senate and even former allies turn against him.

name: Roman Empire
overview: This stylish mix of documentary and historical epic chronicles the reign of Commodus, the emperor whose rule marked the beginning of Rome's fall.

episodes.name: Born in the Purple
episodes.overview: Fighting an implacable enemy in Germany, Marcus Aurelius trains his decadent son Commodus to succeed him, while rumor and intrigues brew back in Rome.

episodes.name: The Making of an Emperor
episodes.overview: The Germanic tribes strike as Marcus Aurelius succumbs to disease, leaving a skeptical Emperor Commodus to prosecute a war that doesn't interest him.

episodes.name: Enemy of the Senate
episodes.overview: Commodus rises to power as Rome's new emperor, but not everyone supports his ascent. Among those conspiring against him: his older sister Lucilla.

episodes.name: Rome is Burning
episodes.overview: Commodus defeats his sister's coup but withdraws from governing, allowing other to amass power while he engages in an affair and banishes his wife.

episodes.name: Fight for Glory
episodes.overview: A disastrous grain shortage reaveals Cleander's treachery and leaves Commodus isolated, inspiring him to trains as a gladiator in a bid to unite Rome.

episodes.name: 14 Days Of Blood
episodes.overview: Lavish imperial games at the Colosseum are highlighted by the emperor's bloody victories, but his paranoid abuses of power lead to a final betrayal.

episodes.name: The Triumvirate
episodes.overview: After success in war makes Caesar a rising star, escalating tension between Rome's two most powerful men creates an opportunity for advancement.

episodes.name: The Great Conqueror
episodes.overview: Caesar's wealth grows as one-third of the triumvirate, but his brutal tatics make enemies, forcing him to remake his image as a military conqueror.

episodes.name: Crossing the Rubicon
episodes.overview: Caesar's hard-won victory over Gaul endears him to the Roman people but leads to a military showdown with the Senate and his former ally, Pompey

episodes.name: Queen of the Nile
episodes.overview: After chasing Pompey to Alexandria, Caesar is victorious I the war, them swiftly makes a powerful ally and lover in Egypt's ruler, Cleopatra.

episodes.name: The Ides of March
episodes.overview: His reforms win public adoration, but Caesar's imperial ambitions antagonize the Senate and I'll health undermines his authority, sparking a conspiracy.

episodes.name: The Rightful Heir
episodes.overview: After the mysterious death of his popular father, young Caligula grows up in the uncertain shadow of his tyrannical emperor and uncle, Tiberius.

episodes.name: A New Hope
episodes.overview: The death of Tiberius vaults Caligula to power as Rome's new emperor, a role at which he initially excels -- until an illness unhinges his mind.

episodes.name: In Search of an Heir
episodes.overview: Vulnerable without an heir, Caligula decides to secure the throne with a child of royal blood by embroiling himself in affairs with his three sisters.

episodes.name: Descent into Madness
episodes.overview: Caligula's increasing paranoia and debauchery lead to ruinous bloodshed and spending as Rome, the Senate and even former allies turn against him.
